page.title: 10GAMES WE PLAY IN TOW LAW.
page.content: BLOCKIE {Someone is "it" and has to {count while the others go and hide. {Then when "it" sees you, you both race {back to the BLOCK; if "it" gets back {first, you've lost! { TIGGIE {"It" has to chase everyone {else. If touched you take over the {chase as "it".}FRENCH TIGGIE{is a {version where you have to stand still {when caught. You are free when someone {runs around you 3 times. { KNOCK-OUT{Everyone takes turns at {trying to score goals. If successful, {you wait for the next round when you {can try again. If unsuccessful you {have to drop out. The last one in is {the winner and takes over in goal. { Other popular games include{cricket and {rounders.
